law.catch_line: Administration and coordination of development programs by Department for Local Government.
law.text: The Department for Local Government shall have responsibility for the administration and coordination of Appalachian regional development programs and economic development administration programs.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 74, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 77, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 62, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 27, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VII, sec. 6.
